Header.title: Light Speed Pacing
Header.paragraph: A wireless pacing light system for any course that can be setup in as little as fifteen minutes.

About.paragraph: Our team started in 2014 and offers a simple design maintained by a group of software and electrical engineers with diverse skill sets.

Services.name: Professional Setup
Services.text: Our team will manage all aspects of the system and support the users.

Services.name: Multiple Pacers
Services.text: The system supports multiple pace lights running at the same time.

Services.name: Mid-Race Adjustment
Services.text: Coaches and race directors can adjust pace during the race without skipping a beat.

Services.name: Artificial Intelligence
Services.text: Future support for AI that learns preferences and recognizes common mistakes.

Services.name: Blockchain
Services.text: Future support to allow system owners to earn revenue by operating their systems.

Services.name: Cloud Compatibility
Services.text: Race times, workout data, and software updates can be stored in the cloud and downloaded over the air.

Testimonials.text: If I'm pacing a race, this is something I want to have.
Testimonials.name: Cory McGee, pro runner

Testimonials.text: Really cool...you should take Ray's comment as a compliment.
Testimonials.name: Kyle Merber, former pro runner

Testimonials.text: I'm not a fan of it.
Testimonials.name: Ray Flynn, world-renowned athletics agent

Features.title: Precision Pacing
Features.text: Accurate pacing for every lap, down to the hundredth of a second.

Features.title: Mobile Control
Features.text: The paces are controlled through a mobile website that can be accessed without needing to install any apps.

Features.title: Wireless Connections
Features.text: This system supports wifi connections for control from the user's mobile phone and is entirely wireless.

Features.title: Battery Powered
Features.text: The batteries include intelligent power management, last all day, and are fully rechargeable.
